front.title: Standards and Guidelines in Forensic Odontology

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology
National Institute of Standards and Technology

front.abstract: This report provides supplemental information to NISTIR 8352 Bitemark Analysis: A NIST Scientific Foundation Review. Standards and guidelines from the American Dental Association (ADA) and the International Organization of Standardization (ISO) as well as efforts by the Organization of Scientific Area Committee (OSAC) for Forensic Science are described and listed. The standards and guidelines discussed in this document represent a snapshot of current practices for bitemark analysis.
